post.summary: Workflow to fill unfilled custom fields on a document
post.description:
Scan document for unfilled custom fields and use llm to predict the values from the document content.

## Supported Custom Field Types

Currently this projects predicting the following kinds of custom fields:
- [x] Boolean
- [x] Date
- [x] Integer
- [x] Number
- [x] Monetary
- [x] Text
- [x] Select
- [ ] Document Link
- [ ] URL
- [ ] LargeText

post.summary: Workflow to suggest a correspondent for a document
post.description:
Given the document content and all possible correspondents select a correspondent using a
reasoning approach. This workflow might take longer given the llm reasoning!

Afterwards set the correspondent of the document, sadly just adding it as another suggestion is not supported
by the paperless api.

WebhookParams.description: General webhook parameters any workflow trigger will accept this type

document_url.description: url of the document that should be processed

next_tag.description: tag to apply to document when finished with processing, this is optional if unspecfied the configured finsh tag will be set
